lead_paragraph: Seven riders, who had to climb down when the roller coaster stalled near the top of the track during its first public ride of the season, reunited a week later to ride it again.

headline.print_headline: Trapped Once, but Forever Stuck on the Cyclone
headline.main: Once Trapped Atop Coney Island Cyclone, but Forever Stuck on It

snippet: Seven riders, who had to climb down when the roller coaster stalled near the top of the track during its first public ride of the season, reunited a week later to ride it again.
abstract: Coney Island's 87-year-old Cyclone roller coaster remains a popular amusement park attraction, despite enduring beyond its glory days; several passengers who were temporarily stranded midair when coaster stalled on first day of season reunite week later to have another go when ride reopens after inspection.
